```{r}
#| cache: TRUE
#| label: model
convert_to_seconds <- function(time_str) {
  if (is.na(time_str) || time_str == "DNF") return(NA)
  parts <- unlist(strsplit(time_str, ":"))
  minutes <- as.numeric(parts[1])
  seconds <- as.numeric(parts[2])
  milliseconds <- as.numeric(parts[3])
  total_seconds <- minutes * 60 + seconds + milliseconds / 1000
  return(total_seconds)
}

Abu_Dhabi_GP <- Abu_Dhabi_GP %>%
  mutate(Time_Retired = sapply(Time_Retired, convert_to_seconds))


Abu_Dhabi_GP$Team <- as.factor(Abu_Dhabi_GP$Team)


fit_race_1 <- brm(formula = Time_Retired ~ Position + Team + Laps + Points + Speed_mph,
                  data = Abu_Dhabi_GP,
                  family = gaussian(),
                  refresh = 0,
                  silent = 2,
                  seed = 9)
```

```{r}
#| label: Abu Dhabi GP plot

ggplot(Abu_Dhabi_GP, aes(x = fct_reorder(Driver, Time_Retired), y = Time_Retired, fill = Driver)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    labs(title = "Abu Dhabi GP 2023",
         subtitle = "Drivers with no lap time did not finish (DNF), or did not start (DNS)",
         x = "Driver",
         y = "Finishing Time",
         color = NA) +
    guides(fill = FALSE) +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
